message.body: I've ever shot anyone else's film though
it makes me sound a lot more current. same for all the films I worked on tho - gaffing, gripping all bumped 2 yrs up
It's like a face lift for your CV
totally. it's gets really confusing with camera - cam op, 2nd cam, add'tl cam. right now just have dp as a section and camera as a section but not totally accurate
